section.title: The lex-smn.txt file
section.p: Some basic lexica for nouns and verbs have been added.

section.title: The nouns
section.p: The file contain a handful of nouns. They are divided into these lexica:

dl.dd: No CG, no 2nd syll vowel alternation
No CG, but 2nd syll vowel is shortened
No CG, but 2nd syll vowel is shortened or lowered
No CG, but 2nd syll vowel is facultatively shortened
No CG, but 2nd syll vowel is facultatively lenghtened

section.title: The adjectives
section.p: This is still just a dummy file, with no adjectives added.

section.title: The verbs
section.p: The copula and negation verb are added, otherwise it is still only a dummy file.

section.title: The closed classes
section.p: Generating the closed classes typically involves less morphophonology. Since it is idiosyncratic anyway, it does not refer (much) to the twol-smn.txt file. The closed-smn-lex.txt file now contains personal, demonstrative, reflexive and interrogative pronouns.
